hints.content:
One way to find how many fewer arms the $\red{\text{starfish}}$ has than the $\blue{\text{octopus}}$ is to find the difference, so we subtract.

$\blue{8} - \red{5} =  \green{\Box}$

Or we can find how many more arms the $\red{\text{starfish}}$ needs to equal the arms on the $\blue{\text{octopus}}$.

$\red{5} + \green{\Box} = \blue{8}$
The starfish has $\green{3}$ fewer arms than the octopus.

question.content:
An octopus has $8$ arms.

A starfish has $5$ arms.
 
**How many fewer arms does the starfish have than the octopus?**

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] arms
